item.title: Report X-2025031205
item.description:
Report X-2025031205

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-27T15:24:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-18
  • City: TUCSON
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A CALL LEFT IN THE HAZMAT AREA WEARING MY PPE AND UTILIZING DECISION TREE. THE PACKAGE HAD A STAIN/WET SPOT ON THE BOTTOM. WHILE PROCESSING THE PACKAGE RESPONDER DISCOVERED THE HAZARDOUS MATERIAL SHIPPING PAPERS AND DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL FLAMMABLE LIQUID 3 LISTING 5 GALLON CONTAINER AS UN1268 PETROLEUM DISTILLATES, NOS, (NON-METHYLENE CHLORIDE), 3, II 19L.
